Source.Name: libspeex
Source.Summary: Audio compression format designed for speech and its converter application
Source.Description: speex is an Open Source/Free Software patent-free audio compression format designed for speech. The Speex Project aims to lower the barrier of entry for voice applications by providing a free alternative to expensive proprietary speech codecs. The package also contains a command-line tool to convert to/from Speex codec
